body_html:
I retried the tutorial again locally (with TitanX, CUDA 8 and the latest Tensorflow version) and it worked.

I'm going to close this because I couldn't reproduce this issue in the latest version. But please don't hesitate to reopen this if it's still not working for you.

Thank you!
